hero.title: Paella & Songs
hero.description: Our master paella chef cooks your chosen paella at your location, with special add-ons. Add a live music show for an unforgettable experience.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Discover the experiences of those who have already enjoyed our paellas.

quotes.mariaGarcia: The paella was spectacular. Our corporate event was a total success thanks to the professional service and authentic flavors.
quotes.juanPerez: After traveling all over Spain, I can say this paella is one of the most authentic I've tasted. The seafood was fresh, and the rice was perfectly cooked.
quotes.lauraMartinez: We hired them for a wedding reception, and they exceeded all expectations. The presentation was beautiful, and the taste was exceptional.

descriptions.descriptionComensales: Indicate the number of people attending your event (minimum 10).
descriptions.descriptionEligePack: Select the pack that best suits your event.
descriptions.descriptionSelectPaella: Choose the type of paella you want for your event.
descriptions.descriptionAssignPortions: Assign the number of portions for each type of paella.
descriptions.descriptionExtras: Add optional extras to complement your order.
descriptions.descriptionDetalles: Provide the final details for your order.
descriptions.paellaLimit: You can select up to 3 different types of paellas.

labels.allSameQuestion: Are all portions the same type of paella?
labels.numDifferentQuestion: How many different types of paella do you want?
labels.assignPortions: Assign the number of portions for each type of paella
labels.seafoodSurcharge: Seafood Surcharge (3€ × {{guests}} people per seafood paella)
labels.customQuote: You have requested a custom quote for this location or large group.

errors.guests: Please indicate the number of guests (minimum 10).
errors.guestsMin: The minimum number of guests is 10.
errors.paella: Please select at least one type of paella.
errors.minPortions: Each paella must have at least {{min}} portions.
errors.submit: There was an error submitting the form. Please try again.
errors.locationError: The location must be within Catalonia.

messages.largeGroup: For groups of {{max}} or more guests, please request a custom quote.
messages.remainingPortions: You still need to assign {{count}} portions.
messages.excessPortions: You have assigned {{count}} portions too many.
messages.seafoodExtrasNote: Seafood extras apply to {{portions}} portions of {{type}}.
messages.priceBreakdownNote: Prices include surcharges for seafood paellas and fideuà (3€/person for {{types}}).
messages.successMessage: We have received your order. We will contact you soon to confirm the details.

description.embajador: Includes Snacks, Iberian Cold Cuts, Valencian Salad, Homemade Sangria, and Paella.
description.embajador-show: Includes Snacks, Iberian Cold Cuts, Valencian Salad, Homemade Sangria, Paella, and a Live Show.
description.amanida: Includes Valencian Salad, Homemade Sangria, and Paella.
description.amanida-show: Includes Valencian Salad, Homemade Sangria, Paella, and a Live Show.
description.pica-pica-show: Includes Starters, Paella, and a Live Show.
description.paella-show: Only includes the Paella and a Live Show.

meat.valenciana.ingredients: Chicken, rabbit, green beans, garrofó beans, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.
meat.hivern.ingredients: Chicken, rabbit, artichokes, broad beans, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.
meat.senyoret.ingredients: Chicken, pork loin, Catalan sausage, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.
meat.costella.ingredients: Pork ribs, mushrooms, onion, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.

seafood.senyoret-peix.ingredients: Squid, peeled shrimp, monkfish, tuna, onion, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.
seafood.marisc.ingredients: Squid, shrimp, monkfish, Norway lobster, onion, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.
seafood.negre.ingredients: Squid, shrimp, monkfish, tuna, onion, squid ink, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.
seafood.calamars.ingredients: Squid, artichokes, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.
seafood.bacalla-cebolla.ingredients: Cod, onion, potato, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.
seafood.mar-muntanya.ingredients: Chicken, shrimp, monkfish, squid, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.

verdures.verdures.ingredients: Green beans, artichokes, peppers, carrot, broad beans, leek, garrofó beans, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.
verdures.verdures-bolets.ingredients: Green beans, artichokes, mushrooms, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika, and rice.

fideua.gandia.ingredients: Fideuà noodles, shrimp, squid, white fish, tomato, olive oil, saffron, sweet paprika.

seafoodExtras.bogavante.description: Add a fresh lobster to your paella
seafoodExtras.carabinero.description: Add fresh carabinero prawns to your paella
seafoodExtras.extra-marisco.description: Increase the amount of seafood in your paella

extras.iberics.description: Additional selection of cold cuts and cheeses
